item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 1:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (645 points | 172 comments)
2. FTC bans hidden fees for live events and short-term rentals, effective May 12 (127 points | 28 comments)
3. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (246 points | 98 comments)
4. Why Bloat Is Still Software's Biggest Vulnerability (2024) (21 points | 5 comments)
5. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (364 points | 357 comments)
6. Show HN: Whippy Term - GUI terminal for embedded development (Linux and Windows) (30 points | 7 comments)
7. Sutton and Barto Book Implementation (25 points | 9 comments)
8. ACE-Step: A step towards music generation foundation model (38 points | 19 comments)
9. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (92 points | 46 comments)
10. Old Timey Code and Old Timey Mono Fonts (56 points | 9 comments)
11. The curse of knowing how, or; fixing everything (959 points | 398 comments)
12. India launches attack on 9 sites in Pakistan and Pakistani Jammu and Kashmir (52 points | 14 comments)
13. Claude's system prompt is over 24k tokens with tools (32 points | 4 comments)
14. Creativity Came to Pass – AI Dystopia (3 points | discuss)
15. Continue (YC S23) is hiring software engineers in San Francisco ( | hide)
16. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (177 points | 91 comments)
17. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (209 points | 70 comments)
18. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (85 points | 40 comments)
19. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (68 points | 19 comments)
20. DEA Once Touted Body Cameras, Now Abandoning Them (53 points | 14 comments)
21. Sneakers (1992) – 4K makeover sourced from the original camera negative (366 points | 252 comments)
22. Reverse-engineering Fujitsu M7MU RELC hardware compression (14 points | 1 comment)
23. Tulsi Gabbard Reused the Same Weak Password on Multiple Accounts for Years (16 points | discuss)
24. Can Speed Radar Measure Music? [video] (6 points | discuss)
25. VVVVVV Source Code (8 points | 1 comment)
26. Show HN: Sheet Music in Smart Glasses (141 points | 19 comments)
27. New studies offer insight into Lyme disease’s treatment, lingering symptoms (161 points | 93 comments)
28. Understanding effective type Aliasing in C [pdf] (28 points | 2 comments)
29. Jury orders NSO to pay $167M for hacking WhatsApp users (10 points | discuss)
30. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (472 points | 455 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 1:20 AM UTC
